entities.description: The act of using prescription sedatives in any way a doctor did not direct you to use them.
Variable indicating if the respondent has ever used sedatives not directed by a doctor.
Recode of SEDNMLIF indicating the most recent sedative misuse.
Variable indicating if the respondent initiated sedative use in the past year.
Variable showing the age at first misuse of sedatives for past year sedative initiates.
The date at which the survey was conducted.
The respondent's lifetime history of sedative use not directed by a doctor.
The respondent's history of sedative use not directed by a doctor within the past year.
The respondent's history of sedative use not directed by a doctor within the past month.
Response option indicating that the answer was logically assigned based on skip patterns.
Response option indicating that no answer was provided or the answer was left blank.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent has used prescription sedatives not directed by a doctor.
Relates the survey to the variable indicating lifetime use of sedatives.
Relates the survey to the recode variable indicating the most recent sedative misuse.
Relates the survey to the variable indicating past year initiate for sedative use.
Relates the survey to the variable showing the age at first misuse of sedatives.
Indicates the date on which the survey was conducted.
Indicates the lifetime use of sedatives not directed by a doctor.
Indicates the past year use of sedatives not directed by a doctor.
Indicates the past month use of sedatives not directed by a doctor.
Indicates that the response was logically assigned based on skip patterns.
Indicates that no answer was provided or the answer was left blank.
